====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|拐棍}} (alternative forms: {{zh-l|柺棍}}, {{zh-l|枴棍}})
* {{zh-l|青藜}} {{qualifier|archaic}}
* {{zh-l|手杖}}

====Usage notes====
* In Mandarin, {{zh-l|拐杖}} is the most commonly used term for [[walking stick]]. By contrast, {{zh-l|手杖}} can be used to describe a [[cane]] that has other uses, such as hiking or scaring away wild snakes.
